Posts.Content: Sep 28, 2015 10:01AM CCCDDD wrote: thanks for starting this thread. I just had BMX 7 days ago. Tomorrow is my first appt with nurse practitioner at PS office. Possible drain removal. Been pretty much planted on the recliner end of my couch since I got home a few days ago. Had Lat-flap on right side Bc of prior lumpectomy/rads there. Pain meds are doing ok but this sh-t hurts!!! How much cc can I expect each visit? I was a C/D cup.
Posts.Title: What to expect when you're expecting...TE fills BDawk CCCDDD
